parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post mentions several candidates by their party affiliation (PSD, AUR, USR, PNL) and one independent candidate (Călin Georgescu).  While not naming them explicitly, the context clearly refers to candidates participating in the parliamentary elections in Dolj County.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content is designed to reach a wide audience interested in the electoral results in Dolj County. The phrase "Vezi cum s-au descurcat în Dolj candidații..." explicitly targets a broad audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>Potentially True. While the post claims to present information on electoral results, the phrasing ("cât de 'eroic' a rămas județul după scrutinul de duminică") suggests an attempt to influence public opinion by framing the outcome in a particular light.  The use of the word "eroic" implies a subjective and potentially biased interpretation of the results. The objective seems to be to generate engagement and discussion around the election results, potentially influencing future voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Partially True. The post presents itself as reporting on election results, which is a journalistic function. However, the subjective and potentially biased language used ("cât de 'eroic' a rămas județul") undermines its journalistic neutrality.  It strays from objective reporting and leans towards opinion and potentially influencing the vote.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; rather, it presents information in a way that is designed to shape public perception of the election results.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>970553078443769</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post walks a fine line. It reports on election results, which is permissible, but the subjective and potentially biased language used ("cât de 'eroic' a rămas județul") pushes it towards electoral propaganda.  The phrasing is designed to evoke a specific emotional response and potentially influence future voting behavior. The targeting of Dolj County and the mention of specific parties and an independent candidate further strengthens the argument that this is electoral propaganda.  The fact that it's a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, amplifies its potential to influence voters.  While not explicitly advocating for or against any candidate, the framing of the information is suggestive and potentially manipulative.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Călin Georgescu</name><impact>NEUTRAL</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>NEUTRAL</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>AUR</name><impact>NEUTRAL</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>USR</name><impact>NEUTRAL</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>NEUTRAL</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>SC INDISCRET MEDIA SRL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
SC INDISCRET MEDIA SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări plătite (ID 970553078443769) cu conținut ce prezintă rezultatele electorale din județul Dolj într-un mod subiectiv și tendențios, utilizând expresii precum „cât de ‘eroic’ a rămas județul după scrutinul de duminică”, cu scopul de a influența opinia publică și comportamentul electoral al cetățenilor.  Postarea vizează mai mulți candidați, menționând explicit partidele PSD, AUR, USR, PNL și candidatul independent Călin Georgescu, fără a-i denumi direct, dar contextul fiind evident.  Efectul electoral al postării este de a crea o percepție favorabilă sau nefavorabilă asupra rezultatelor electorale, influențând astfel voturile viitoare.  Postarea a generat între 9.000 și 10.000 de impresii, având o estimare a acoperirii de 500.000-1.000.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Cheltuielile pentru această postare au fost sub 100 RON.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: indiscretinoltenia@gmail.com, +40251522011, strada Mihail Kogălniceanu, nr.20, Craiova, Dolj 200390, RO.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
